mapper.sql: ID, CTM_NAME, CTM_BAR_CODE, CTM_TYPE, LARGE_AREA, COUNT_JD, HOUR_JD, COUNT_CJ, HOUR_CJ, COUNT_LY, HOUR_LY, COUNT_GD, HOUR_GD, COUNT_LPCL, HOUR_LPCL, COUNT_KSCL, HOUR_KSCL, COUNT_QSB, HOUR_QSB, COUNT_TJCL, HOUR_TJCL, COUNT_SD, HOUR_SD, COUNT_DD, HOUR_DD, DAY_COUNT, STU_NUM, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from PRIME_CODE_REPORT
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into PRIME_CODE_REPORT (ID, CTM_NAME, CTM_BAR_CODE, CTM_TYPE, LARGE_AREA, COUNT_JD, HOUR_JD, COUNT_CJ, HOUR_CJ, COUNT_LY, HOUR_LY, COUNT_GD, HOUR_GD, COUNT_LPCL, HOUR_LPCL, COUNT_KSCL, HOUR_KSCL, COUNT_QSB, HOUR_QSB, COUNT_TJCL, HOUR_TJCL, COUNT_SD, HOUR_SD, COUNT_DD, HOUR_DD, DAY_COUNT, STU_NUM, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctmBarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctmType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{largeArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countJd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hourJd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{countCj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hourCj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{countLy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hourLy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{countGd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hourGd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{countLpcl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hourLpcl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{countKscl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hourKscl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{countQsb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hourQsb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{countTjcl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hourTjcl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{countSd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hourSd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{countDd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hourDd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dayCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stuNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update PRIME_CODE_REPORT set CTM_NAME = #{ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTM_BAR_CODE = #{ctmBarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTM_TYPE = #{ctmType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LARGE_AREA = #{largeArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNT_JD = #{countJd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HOUR_JD = #{hourJd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COUNT_CJ = #{countCj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HOUR_CJ = #{hourCj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COUNT_LY = #{countLy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HOUR_LY = #{hourLy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COUNT_GD = #{countGd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HOUR_GD = #{hourGd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COUNT_LPCL = #{countLpcl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HOUR_LPCL = #{hourLpcl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COUNT_KSCL = #{countKscl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HOUR_KSCL = #{hourKscl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COUNT_QSB = #{countQsb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HOUR_QSB = #{hourQsb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COUNT_TJCL = #{countTjcl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HOUR_TJCL = #{hourTjcl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COUNT_SD = #{countSd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HOUR_SD = #{hourSd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COUNT_DD = #{countDd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HOUR_DD = #{hourDd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DAY_COUNT = #{dayCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STU_NUM = #{stuNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from PRIME_CODE_REPORT
and CREATE_TIME >= #{date1}
and CREATE_TIME <= #{date2}
and CTM_BAR_CODE in (${str3})
and STU_NUM in (select stu_num from staff_user where stu_name in (${str4}))
and CTM_NAME like '%${str5}%'
and CTM_TYPE like '%${str6}%'
and LARGE_AREA like '%${str7}%'
